text_block_list.text: On a day off while taking a walk, I bumped in to Narita Top Road. She seemed excited about something.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Looks like the time to get from the dorm to the station is fine! Looks like there will be plenty of time. ――Right, let's head to the station.
choice_data_list: Heading somewhere?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Yeah, I was planning on going to the amusement park! ……Though today is just a trial run.
choice_data_list: A trial run for the amusement park……?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Next time, I was planning on going with some friends, and I was put in charge of this. So I was thinking of getting a preview and preparing for it!
She said it matter-of-factly……but it was probably rough to do this alone. That said, if I told her I wanted to help, she'd probably decline――
choice_data_list: Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?
Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: With Trainer-san? ……Ah, sorta like a change of pace? But, if you go with me, you won't be able to see much――
choice_data_list: But it'll be more fun!
But it'll be more fun!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, you're right! If I looked around with Trainer-san I could spend the whole day having fun! Let's go together!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Well then, what I wanted to check out today was…… the schedule for the attractions and how crowded it would be. I'll use that to plan for the day itself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Everyone's looking forward to the parade, so we'll definitely have to check that out. I'll have to create a course that takes the parade in to account.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Okaaay, the parade times are……the first one is at 11:30. Which means we won't be able to line up for other attractions, huh……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: So maybe souvenirs first……but, then we have to carry them around.
choice_data_list: How about having an early lunch?

text_block_list.text: The parade ended just around lunch time. Around that time, the restaurants would start to get crowded and the lines for the popular attractions might die down.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see……! By doing that, we can avoid the crowds for lunch and the attractions! Looks like it'll be easier to get on the popular attractions, too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Then, next up……we need to find a restaurant for lunch, right!? I'll need to keep a few of the places in mind!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: This shop looks good! You can see the parade course from the window, so you can see how crowded it will be!
choice_data_list: A seat near the exit might be best

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: You're right, if possible I want to see if we can request seats. Now, let's order something and see how long it takes!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Mmm~, it's tasty……! But, that was unexpected. To think I'd have trouble deciding after looking at the menu!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I was still having a hard time deciding, even after Trainer-san had already ordered. Looks like I need to consider how long it'll take to decide.
choice_data_list: Want a bite?

text_block_list.text: I hadn't touched it yet, so I took my knife and cut a piece off, putting it on her plate.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ! Thanks alot! I see, sharing……! If we did that, then we wouldn't have to worry over what to order. Fufu, it sounds like a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Alright, looks like we've found a good spot! There's nothing blocking the view here!
choice_data_list: There might be more space over there

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: That's true……looks like there's plenty of space over there. That might be a good spot too……――Ah! The parade's here!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Waaa! At the front is the Carrot Queen! Her outfit's really cute! The float looks really grand too……!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: The dancers and the music are really sparkly too…… Ah, looks like you can participate in the dance too!
choice_data_list: Let's try it out!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: 'Round and 'round and 'round……fufuu! Seeing Trainer-san dancing is pretty unusual! Fufufu!
We enjoyed the parade to its fullest. Right after that, we went to the most popular attraction in the park, the Jet Coaster.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Even the Jet Coaster is crowded during lunch since it's so popular, huh. ――Yeah, I guess that means after the parade is the Big Thunder Mountain!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: One of my classmates said that it's easy to get 『Motion Sick』 on it so ……I thought it might be better to check it out beforehand!
choice_data_list: Alright, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Wa, wa, wa, wa-……! L-look at that, the people down there are waving……H-heeeey! Haha……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Hii-, wai-……iyaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……S-sorry, it wasn't supposed to be like this…… Ugghh……
choice_data_list: Are you okay? We can rest over at――

text_block_list.text: I open the park map and try to find a place to take a break. Looks like there are some benches around the nearby pond. I supported her as we made our way there.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: …………Huuu……
choice_data_list: Feeling better?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Yeah, thanks to you. I'm sorry for bothering you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ………… ……Trainer-san, um……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Are you having fun?
choice_data_list: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I mean, ever since this morning, you've spent all day with me……I was thinking it would be a good change of pace. But, you haven't really been having fun right?
choice_data_list: It's fun because I'm with you
It's fun because I'm with you

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: But, I've just been one-sidedly having you help me. Am I not being a bother……?
choice_data_list: No. ――Is it a burden for you?
No. ――Is it a burden for you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Not even a little bit! As the one in charge, I decided to do this myself!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Because I want everyone to enjoy it to the fullest! That makes it worth doing! It's something I, myself, want to do!
choice_data_list: It's the same for me

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……The same?
Being able to devote yourself to someone else. And on top of that, feeling that it's worth doing. I tell Narita Top Road that I think she's amazing to be able to feel like that.
That's why I wanted her to see it through. I wanted her to live up to everyone's expectations. But, if it was hard for her to do it alone then――
choice_data_list: Don't hesitate to rely on me
Don't hesitate to rely on me

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?
Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: With both of us…………Ah.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (……That's right. More so than by myself. With two of us, we'll be able come up with better ideas……!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (So we can make this as fun as we can for everyone. ――It's fine to borrow someone else's strength!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ……Then if Trainer-san is saying that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Can I ask you to continue accompanying me?
choice_data_list: Gladly!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much! Well then, next up……let's go to the Haunted Halls!
I followed after Narita Top Road who had a bright and cheerful smile on her face. The time we spent brainstorming ideas was very productive.
